QuestData.Title: Alicia's Poem
QuestData.Description: Hi, I wrote a poem for my friend Caylee. She likes to hang out with the Aldor in Shattrath City. You know, in Outland?$b$bCould you take my poem to her? My mommy says I'm too young to go to Shattrath City!
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been asked to deliver Alicia's Poem to Caylee Dak in Shattrath City in Outland.
QuestData.RewardText: What a touching poem, thank you!
